resources.string:
SWIVEL APP

 Find wheelchair-accessible toilets and parking spaces.

 Finding clean, accessible toilets and parking spaces can be a real challenge for wheelchair users on the move. We know the amount of planning it takes to get to a desired location, so we came up with a solution – ‘Swivel’.

 Swivel gives you the power to locate and navigate wheelchair-friendly toilets and parking spaces on an interactive map along with giving vital accessibility information across major buildings in Melbourne – CBD.

 Swivel is easy to use; just search for the desired destination and it will do the rest!
